boardgame.name: Cable Car
San Francisco Cable Car
boardgame.description: Cable Car is a reworked rerelease of the game originally published in 1997 by db-Spiele as Iron Horse and in 2000 by Queen Games as Metro, with a different theme, new artwork and the components and rules to play the new, optional variant _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Cable Car Company,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which introduces stock holding to the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players place square tiles onto the board to form rail lines. The object of the game is to make the rail lines as long as possible. Players start with a number of cars ringing the board. When a tile placement connects a car to a station (either to those on the edge or to the power station in the center of the board), that car is turned to indicate it has been scored and the player scores one point for each tile that the route crosses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(Slightly reworded for clarity and consistency from Queen Games' announcement of the game.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Metro_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Season 2: Episode #6 Back in the Saddle

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New in Shrink. £7.00 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (700 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.
Queen Games.

Queen Games (QNG 60552) Completely reworked remake of Metro, with a new theme, better material and including the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cable Car_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Expansion. Players are putting square tiles onto the board to form rail lines. The object of the game is to make the rail lines as long as possible. Players start with a number of trains ringing the board. Whenever a tile placement connects a train to a station (either on the edge or the center of the board), that train is removed and the player scores one point for each tile that the route crosses. Reimplements: •Metro

Queen Games (QNG 60552) Completely reworked remake of Metro, with a new theme, better material and including the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cable Car_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Expansion. Players are putting square tiles onto the board to form rail lines. The object of the game is to make the rail lines as long as possible. Players start with a number of trains ringing the board. Whenever a tile placement connects a train to a station (either on the edge or the center of the board), that train is removed and the player scores one point for each tile that the route crosses. Reimplements: -Metro

Queen Games - Cable Car Language: Dutch, French, English, Italian _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Spanish Players: 2 to 6 Age: 8+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 1.800 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Cable Car is a reworked rerelease of the the game originally published in 1997 by db-Spiele as Iron Horse and in 2000 by Queen Games as Metro, with a different theme, new artwork and the components and rules to play the new, optional variant _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cable Car Company,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; which introduces stock holding to the game. Players place square tiles onto the board to form rail lines. The object of the game is to make the rail lines as long as possible. Players start with a number of cars ringing the board. When a tile placement connects a car to a station (either to those on the edge or to the power station in the center of the board), that car is turned to indicate it has been scored and the player scores one point for each tile that the route crosses. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

In wonderful condition - everything is near mint. Shipping is $10, split 50/50, buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s share is $5 (additional games are $2.50 each shipping). Game and all bits included and smoke free. I prefer payment via Amazon payments or Amazon gift card but also accept checks. Sorry, no PayPal. Enjoy!
